title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for use of FTC

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for Euler's method with two steps

One point is earned for Euler's approximation to f(−1)

f( − 1 2 )≈f(0)+ f ′ (0)⋅( − 1 2 )=5+0⋅( − 1 2 )=5 f(−1)≈f( − 1 2 )+ f ′ ( − 1 2 )⋅( − 1 2 )=5+3⋅( − 1 2 )= 7 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGMb WaaeWaaeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjk aiaawMcaaiabgIKi7kaadAgacaGGOaGaaGimaiaacMcacqGHRaWkce WGMbGbauaacaGGOaGaaGimaiaacMcacqGHflY1daqadaqaaiabgkHi TmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0 JaaGynaiabgUcaRiaaicdacqGHflY1daqadaqaaiabgkHiTmaalaaa baGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGynaa qaaiaadAgacaGGOaGaeyOeI0IaaGymaiaacMcacqGHijYUcaWGMbWa aeWaaeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaaGaayjkai aawMcaaiabgUcaRiqadAgagaqbamaabmaabaGaeyOeI0YaaSaaaeaa caaIXaaabaGaaGOmaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHflY1daqadaqaai abgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa eyypa0JaaGynaiabgUcaRiaaiodacqGHflY1daqadaqaaiabgkHiTm aalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0Za aSaaaeaacaaI3aaabaGaaGOmaaaaaaaa@7814@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for separate variables

One point is earned for antiderivatives

One point is earned for constant of integration

One point is earned if uses initial condition

One point is earned if solves for y

Note: max 2/5 [1-1-0-0-0] if no constant of integration
